description: API for global product category size chart

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Product id is assigned when registering a successful category is required for all requests

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale for bill return, using in mobile user permission is 'en_GB', Will be unified into local param later

parameters.name: source_id
parameters.description: Provides a unique identifier for a merchant

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicates when type is error, Empty if no error

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicates error details if bit.error. Empty if no error

response_fields.name: category_id
response_fields.description: The number of the API request for one minute
